rows.label: qev093007_MSG0010
rows.name:
That's itâ€”our task is done.
They'll never harm an innocent again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0020
rows.name:
The Custodian herself
has cleaned up the old one's mess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0025
rows.name: ...The matter can finally be put to bed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0030
rows.name: Lady Neil... Was this really the right thing to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0040
rows.name:
They were erratic and unsafe, but...
were they not also a part of you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0050
rows.name: There's an easy answer to that one, Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0060
rows.name:
If you are always chained to the past,
you can never look to the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0070
rows.name:
Even if it means denying my old selves' legacy,
I still intend to right their wrongs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0080
rows.name:
We Qlu must rise above our past,
if we're to soar once again through the infinite beyond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0090
rows.name:
Among the acolytes, there were some who
disputed your authority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0100
rows.name: Some even called you "heretic."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0110
rows.name: Now I see the truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0120
rows.name:
I see that...you have always had Qlu's
best interests at heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0130
rows.name: The same can be said of all Qlurians, Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0135
rows.name: You see, the only difference is how we go about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0140
rows.name:
Besides, making contact with alien races...
It's not always the solar storm we think it'll be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0150
rows.name:
We don't need faith and tech as crutches.
Not when words can bridge the gap between worlds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0160
rows.name:
We have a prime example of that right here.
...Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0170
rows.name: Yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0180
rows.name:
Now... We've wrapped up our business in Cauldros,
but there's still much work to be done on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0190
rows.name:
So many races journeyed through the stars to end up on
this single planet... Cosmoarchaeologically speaking, it's odd.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0200
rows.name:
The way Mira keeps presenting mystery upon mystery,
I doubt my work's drying up anytime soon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_JNK0210
rows.name: Effervesce

rows.label: qev093007_SEL0220
rows.name:
Tell her you're ready to take
any job she throws at you.

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0230
rows.name:
Oh, you're pretty much indispensable at this point
if I'm to perform my fieldwork here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0240
rows.name:
Hey, why don't you become my assistant?
Yeah! That's a great idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0250
rows.name:
Er, Lady Neil... The humans might have pressing
matters of their own to deal with right now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_JNK0260
rows.name: Deflate

rows.label: qev093007_SEL0270
rows.name: Complain that you need a vacation.

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0280
rows.name:
Aha ha! Actually...now that you mention it,
I am feeling a little worn out, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0290
rows.name:
When we're back in NLA, how about I take us
all out to dinner to unwind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0300
rows.name: Naturally, your Gaur friend can come too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093007_MSG0310
rows.name: Sure! I'm in![ST:wait ]
